definitions: a light-sensitive pigmented spot on the bodies of invertebrates such as flatworms, starfishes, and microscopic crustaceans, and also in some unicellular organisms.
shortDefinitions: light-sensitive pigmented spot on bodies of invertebrates such as flatworms

definitions: a rounded eye-like marking on an animal, especially on the wing of a butterfly or moth.
a fungal disease of cereals, sugar cane, and other cultivated grasses, characterized by yellowish oval spots on the leaves and stems.

notes.text: The fungus is typically Pseudocercosporella herpotrichoides, subdivision Deuteromycotina

shortDefinitions: fungal disease of cereals and other cultivated grasses
